bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum manipulated mainframe, 3D box downtube/headtube, forged dropouts with eyelets, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc brake compatible, tuned for 100mm fork travel, disc specific (no bosses)

components.description: RockShox Judy TT, 100mm travel, preload adj., steel steerer, elastomer/coil spring
Threadless 1 1/8" sealed loose ball with alloy cap
Shimano 515 long arm mechanical disc, 6" rotor
Shimano 515 long arm mechanical disc, 6" rotor
TruVativ X-Forge, forged alloy, capless bolts
TruVativ BB-02-SQ-XR, square taper, 68mm shell, 113mm spindle, sealed cartridge
Dual sided, composite body, steel cage, clip compatible
Joy-Tech, disc, 32 hole, ground race double sealed loose ball
Joy-Tech, disc, freehub, 32 hole, ground race double sealed loose ball
14g stainless steel, brass nipples (Front: L262/R264 Rear: L264/R262)
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
